settings.subtitle: The new Wireless V4 has an ultimate combination of convenience & sustainability.

settings.title:
Motion detection can be triggered
up to 12 meters

Set off alarm based on specific
time & day

Trigger full white lights at night
time

House security overview in

settings.subtitle: Innovated with true advanced motion detection technology. It uses a breakthrough ultra-sensitive PIR sensor, eliminating false triggers such as small birds, falling leaves and trees moving in the wind.

settings.bannertitle: Watch the Night with Lights & Color
settings.subtitle: Enhance your security with crystal clear, full color footage, even in low light conditions thanks to our Advanced Starlight Technology.

settings.title: 4MP | 2K HD Resolution
settings.desc: The camera produces sharp and smooth video footage. It also supports Wide Dynamic Range Technology technology, allowing the camera to perform well in challenging lighting conditions and capture crisp videos.

settings.title: Capture Critical Evidence with 8x zoom
settings.desc: See more of the picture with an ultra-wide 120 degrees FOV, 4x digital zoom and 2K HD. High compression technology keeps all images and videos in high quality, full color and low in size.

settings.title: Respond In Real-Time
settings.desc: Stay connected and in control with our 2-way communication feature. Not only can you see and hear what's happening at your property, but you can also communicate directly with anyone on the premises through your security camera. This added level of interaction provides peace of mind and the ability to respond to any situation immediately.

settings.title: Recordings
settings.desc:
Easily access and download any image or video from a previous date with just one tap, from either:

  • SD/Memory card
  • Cloud Storage

settings.bannertitle: Experience full control over a pan, tilt, and zoom camera with a 355Â° horizontal and 100Â° vertical range

settings.title: UNLIMITED ACCESS
settings.desc: Give access & manage unlimited people with different access level.

settings.subtitle: Equipped with the strongest and most durable IP66 weatherproof case for all-season security.
Say goodbye forever to messy wires searching for the nearest power outlet, constantly changing batteries and dangerous loss of coverage during power outages.
